flavorText: It doesn't need a bite. The bark works just fine.

foreignData.flavorText: Wie es in den Wald schallt, so schallt es auch wieder heraus.
foreignData.name: Baumvolk des Spiegelwalds
foreignData.text: {2}{R}{W}: Wenn das nächste Mal in diesem Zug dem Baumvolk des Spiegelwaldes Schaden zugefügt werden würde, wird dieser Schaden stattdessen einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl zugefügt.

foreignData.flavorText: À quoi bon des ongles ou des dents, quand on a une telle écorce.
foreignData.name: Sylvin de Boismiroir
foreignData.text: {2}{R}{W}: La prochaine fois que des blessures devraient être infligées au Sylvin de Boismiroir ce tour-ci, ces blessures seront infligées à la place à une cible, créature ou joueur.

foreignData.name: ミラーウッド・ツリーフォーク

name: Mirrorwood Treefolk
originalText:
o2o
Ro
W: The next time damage would be dealt to Mirrorwood Treefolk this turn, that damage is dealt to target creature or player instead.

rulings.text: If the target creature is not on the battlefield (or is not a creature) at the time the damage would be redirected, then the damage goes on this card.

The ability applies to the next time damage is dealt. Normally this means damage from one source at one time, but during combat it is possible for multiple sources to damage the Treefolk at one time, in which case damage from all of those sources is redirected.

text: {2}{R}{W}: The next time damage would be dealt to Mirrorwood Treefolk this turn, that damage is dealt to any target instead.
